thread.title: Florence Henderson to join final ‘Dancing with the Stars’ cruise
thread.title_full: Florence Henderson to join final ‘Dancing with the Stars’ cruise | Fox News

author: FoxNews.com
title: Florence Henderson to join final ‘Dancing with the Stars’ cruise
text:
Published August 17, 2015 FoxNews.com Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print Kym Johnson, Florence Henderson, Carson Kressley will make appearances on the final "Dancing with the Stars" themed cruises. (Courtesy Holland America)
Fans of ABC’s “Dancing with the Stars” can enjoy one last dance at sea with Holland America’s final themed cruises in January.
The cruise line, which began its partnership with the show in 2013, has offered guests the chance to compete on every sailing of the company’s 15 ships over the past two years for a chance to represent their ship on the upcoming Jan 10. Champions Cruise . Winners with the highest score from each ship are awarded a free ocean-view stateroom to compete for the coveted Mirrorball Trophy and title of Dancing with the Stars: At Sea Champion, aboard the Nieuw Amsterdam .
"Brady Bunch" matriarch Florence Henderson and fashion expert Carson Kressley will be joined by professional dancers—and Mirrorball Trophy winners-- Tony Dovolani and Kym Johnson.
Guests will have the chance to meet the celebrities on board, ask questions and participate in photo ops. They will also get to attend exclusive performances, take part in lessons with the ship’s professional dancers and watch a fashion show featuring real costumes worn by participants on the show.
The dancing celebs will appear first appear on a Caribbean Cruise on the Nieuw Amsterdam , departing Ft. Lauderdale Jan. 3, 2016 and on the Champions Cruise departing the following week on Jan. 10.
